TranRunJLiteSamples
Class MotorSim

java.lang.Object
  TranRunJLite.TrjTask
      TranRunJLiteSamples.MotorSim

public class MotorSim
extends TrjTask

Simulates a DC brush motor with a gearbox and load Motor inductance is ignored

Author:
DMAuslander, July 10, 2009

Constructor Detail

MotorSim

public MotorSim(java.lang.String name,
                TrjSys sys,
                double v,
                double r,
                double rotorInertia,
                double rotorDamping,
                double torqueK,
                double backEmfK,
                double loadInertia,
                double shaftK,
                double shaftB,
                double loadB,
                double gearRatio,
                boolean useAdaptiveSolver)
Constructor for the MotorSim class

Parameters:
name -
sys - The TrjSys this task is part of
v - Applied voltage
r - Mtor coil resistance, ohm
rotorInertia - kg-m^2 (gram-cm^2 in motor spec)
torqueK - Motor torque constant, Nm/A
backEmfK - Back EMF constant, V/(rad/sec)
loadInertia - kg-m^2
shaftK - Shaft rotary spring constant, Nm/rad
loadB - Friction (damping) on load, Nm/(rad/sec)
gearRatio - Unitless (gr > 1 means motor turns faster than load)
useAdaptiveSolver - 'true' to use the adaptive ODE solver
